content.title: Kalpana Chawla Chatravriti Yojana
content.details: Launched in 2012-13 by the Government of Himachal Pradesh in honor of the late astronaut Kalpana Chawla, the 'Kalpana Chawla Chatravriti Yojana' is a scholarship scheme that provides financial assistance to girls of Himachal Pradesh who belong to economically weaker sections and wish to pursue higher education without any financial burden, achieve their career goals and become self-reliant. The scheme is applicable to all the eligible girl students who are residents of Himachal Pradesh and studying in recognized institutions within the state.
benefits: The scholarship amount is â‚¹ 15,000 per annum, which will be disbursed to the beneficiary's bank account directly.
The scholarship is renewable for up to five years, subject to the student meeting the eligibility criteria.
eligibility: The applicant must be a resident of Himachal Pradesh.
The applicant must be a girl.
The applicant must be a regular student of 10+2, academic, professional or technical course in Science/Arts/Commerce stream.
The institution where the applicant is admitted must be a Government / Government Aided / Private School affiliated with the Himachal Pradesh Board of School Education.
The scholarship is available for higher education courses, including undergraduate, postgraduate, and professional courses.
The scholarship will be given strictly on 10+2 merit declared by the Himachal Pradesh Board of School Education, Dharamshala.
documents_required: Admission Certificate of the Post 10+2 Course
Selection Letter Granted by the Educational Authority

faqs.question: What Is Kalpana Chawla Chatravriti Yojana?
faqs.answer: The Kalpana Chawla Chatravriti Yojana is a scholarship scheme launched by the government of Himachal Pradesh to provide financial assistance to meritorious girl students belonging to economically weaker sections.

faqs.question: Can A Girl Student Apply For The Scholarship If She Is Studying In A School Outside Of Himachal Pradesh?
faqs.answer: No, only students studying in schools located in Himachal Pradesh are eligible for the scholarship.

faqs.question: How Much Financial Assistance Is Provided Under The Kalpana Chawla Chatravriti Yojana?
faqs.answer: The selected candidates are provided financial assistance of Rs. 15,000 per annum for their studies.

faqs.question: When Is The Last Date To Apply For The Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The last date to apply for the Kalpana Chawla Chatravriti Yojana is usually in the month of September, but it may vary every year.

faqs.question: Is There Any Application Fee To Apply For The Scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, there is no application fee to apply for the Kalpana Chawla Chatravriti Yojana.

faqs.question: What Documents Are Required To Apply For The Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The following documents are required: Aadhar Card, Passing Certificate of Class 12, Admission Certificate of the Post 10+2 Course, Copy of Bank Passbook, Copy of Fee Receipt, Copy of the Selection Letter Granted by the Educational Authority, Passport Size Photo, Domicile Certificate of Himachal Pradesh, Income Certificate, Fee Payment Receipt, Bonafide Certificate.

faqs.question: Can A Candidate Apply For The Scholarship In Multiple Years?
faqs.answer: Yes, a candidate can apply for the scholarship in multiple years, provided she fulfills the eligibility criteria.

faqs.question: Can A Candidate Apply For The Scholarship If She Is Already Receiving Financial Assistance From Other Sources?
faqs.answer: Yes, a candidate can apply for the scholarship even if she is receiving financial assistance from other sources. However, she must disclose the details of other scholarships while applying.

faqs.question: How Are The Candidates Selected For The Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The candidates are selected based on their academic performance, financial need, and overall merit.

faqs.question: How Are The Scholarship Amounts Disbursed To The Selected Candidates?
faqs.answer: The scholarship amounts are directly transferred to the bank account of the selected candidates.

faqs.question: Is There Any Penalty For Providing False Information In The Application?
faqs.answer: Yes, if a candidate is found to have provided false information in the application, her scholarship will be cancelled, and she may also face legal action.

faqs.question: Is There Any Age Limit To Apply For The Scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, there is no age limit to apply for the Kalpana Chawla Chatravriti Yojana.
